name: Pixel Cars: Retro Racing
description:
Pixel Cars is a fun racing game where you drive a nice pixel art car into a dense traffic highway, with a twist, you are going wrong way! The goal of the game is to get as far as possible without crashing into other cars coming in front of you. Simply tap left or right to switch lanes to avoid collision and collect coins on the way. With coins you can then unlock new cars!
Simple to play, but hard to master! When you have mastered it you can then challenge your friends to beat your score on Gamecenter.

- Addictive gameplay
- Retro pixel art graphics
- Cool chiptune music from dubmood
- 15 unlockable cars
- Gameplay video recording and sharing
